revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = Archer T4E 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wireless Dual Band PCI Express Adapter |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/us/home-networking/pci-adapter/archer-t4e/ |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/us/support/download/archer-t4e/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_T4E |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer T4 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = E |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 29, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_Archer_T4E |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = Archer T |if = PCIe |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = single-lane
|vendor_id = 10ec |device_id = 8812 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TE7T4E |icid = 8853A-T4E |boardid = 2052500653 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AE; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = Yes |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = 256QAM, DFS |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/27/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 840030700040 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833704464 |asin = B07NFMSGGR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "2052500653" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK|Realtek#ac}}
<small> *'''Easy Installation''' - Plug the adapter into an available PCI Express slot to upgrade desktop *'''High Speed Wi-Fi''' - Up to 1.2Gbps (867Mbps on 5GHz band and 300Mpbs on 2.4GHz band) *'''802.11ac Dual Band''' - 3 times faster than the 802.11n standard, perfect for network usage *'''Beamforming''' - Wi-Fi signals are strengthened towards certain direction where client exists *'''Multiple-Size Brackets''' - Low profile and full heigh brackets are both provided, suitable for PC *'''Broad Wireless Range''' - Two external antennas ensure Wi-Fi coverage and enhanced stability *'''2Ã—2 MIMO''' - Users can easily access to high-speed wireless connection </small>
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Archer T4E 01.jpg| File:Archer T4E 02.jpg| File:Archer T4E 06.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[TP-LINK Archer T9E]] - AC1900 Wireless Dual Band PCIe Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T8E]] - AC1750 Wireless Dual Band PCIe Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T6E]] - AC1300 Wireless Dual Band PCIe Adapter *[[TP-LINK Archer T4E]] - AC1200 Wireless Dual Band PCIe Adapter
